#Installation Instruction

= Installation =

The installation for formattime is pretty straightforward.
1. download the package.
2. unbzip and untar it by 'tar xvfjp package_name-VERSION.tar.bz2'
3. cd package_name-VERSION
4. run 'sudo python setup.py install' (the setuptool will get it installed to your python runtime library location)

= Test =

The formattime module contains a unittest to test its correctness. Just run 'formattime_test.py'.
